title: Can you lose your ability to read? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. There are many reasons; head trauma or injury, blindness or dementia. I had one good friend who lost the ability to comprehend the written word when her husband unexpectedly left her. She left the profession she had worked at for over 30 years because it became an issue there as well.

wow. this a good question. i would say that even after a lifetime of reading and input i guess it is possible for anything to happen. i never heard of it before but even older people with alzheimer's are still able to read stop signs and comprehend stop signs. they even can read their most cherished items like bless or birthday cards etc etc.
